descriptions: Fails to identify any relevant ideas or events from the text.

Identifies nearly all key ideas and events accurately and provides a clear overview.

Explains the development of ideas or events with adequate detail and textual support.
Clearly articulates how the ideas or events evolve and change throughout the text, providing strong support.
Demonstrates a deep understanding of the development, tracing the evolution of ideas or events with insightful analysis and strong textual evidence.
